CustomField.description: Flag to classify whether a Contact is "Direct Source." Based on criteria of either of the key phrases "Demo", "Contact Us", or "Contact Sales" being present in the Last Campaign Name.
CustomField.formula:
OR(
CONTAINS( Last_Campaign__r.Name, "Demo" ), CONTAINS( Last_Campaign__r.Name, "Contact Us" ), CONTAINS( Last_Campaign__r.Name, "Contact Sales" ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Flag to classify whether a Contact is currently considered "Direct Source."
CustomField.label: Direct Request
